title: Eleanor and Franklin: The Story of Their Relationship Based on Eleanor Roosevelt's Private Papers
description: In his extraordinary biography of the major political couple of the twentieth century, Joseph P. Lash reconstructs from Eleanor Roosevelt's personal papers her early life and four-decade marriage to the four-time president who brought America back from the Great Depression and helped to win World War II. The result is an intimate look at the vibrant private and public worlds of two incomparable people.
author: Joseph P. Lash
